endpoints.description: Run a single prediction on the model

parameters.name: mask

param_schema.title: Mask
param_schema.description: Image mask for image inpainting mode. If provided, aspect_ratio, width, and height inputs are ignored.

parameters.description: Image mask for image inpainting mode. If provided, aspect_ratio, width, and height inputs are ignored.

parameters.name: seed

param_schema.title: Seed
param_schema.description: Random seed. Set for reproducible generation

parameters.description: Random seed. Set for reproducible generation

parameters.name: image

param_schema.title: Image
param_schema.description: Input image for image to image or inpainting mode. If provided, aspect_ratio, width, and height inputs are ignored.

parameters.description: Input image for image to image or inpainting mode. If provided, aspect_ratio, width, and height inputs are ignored.

parameters.name: model

param_schema.description: Which model to run inference with. The dev model performs best with around 28 inference steps but the schnell model only needs 4 steps.

parameters.description: Which model to run inference with. The dev model performs best with around 28 inference steps but the schnell model only needs 4 steps.

parameters.name: width

param_schema.title: Width
param_schema.description: Width of generated image. Only works if `aspect_ratio` is set to custom. Will be rounded to nearest multiple of 16. Incompatible with fast generation

parameters.description: Width of generated image. Only works if `aspect_ratio` is set to custom. Will be rounded to nearest multiple of 16. Incompatible with fast generation

parameters.name: height

param_schema.title: Height
param_schema.description: Height of generated image. Only works if `aspect_ratio` is set to custom. Will be rounded to nearest multiple of 16. Incompatible with fast generation

parameters.description: Height of generated image. Only works if `aspect_ratio` is set to custom. Will be rounded to nearest multiple of 16. Incompatible with fast generation

parameters.name: prompt

param_schema.title: Prompt
param_schema.description: Prompt for generated image. If you include the `trigger_word` used in the training process you are more likely to activate the trained object, style, or concept in the resulting image.

parameters.description: Prompt for generated image. If you include the `trigger_word` used in the training process you are more likely to activate the trained object, style, or concept in the resulting image.

parameters.name: go_fast

param_schema.title: Go Fast
param_schema.description: Run faster predictions with model optimized for speed (currently fp8 quantized); disable to run in original bf16

parameters.description: Run faster predictions with model optimized for speed (currently fp8 quantized); disable to run in original bf16

parameters.name: extra_lora

param_schema.title: Extra Lora
param_schema.description: Load LoRA weights. Supports Replicate models in the format <owner>/<username> or <owner>/<username>/<version>, HuggingFace URLs in the format huggingface.co/<owner>/<model-name>, CivitAI URLs in the format civitai.com/models/<id>[/<model-name>], or arbitrary .safetensors URLs from the Internet. For example, 'fofr/flux-pixar-cars'

parameters.description: Load LoRA weights. Supports Replicate models in the format <owner>/<username> or <owner>/<username>/<version>, HuggingFace URLs in the format huggingface.co/<owner>/<model-name>, CivitAI URLs in the format civitai.com/models/<id>[/<model-name>], or arbitrary .safetensors URLs from the Internet. For example, 'fofr/flux-pixar-cars'

parameters.name: lora_scale

param_schema.title: Lora Scale
param_schema.description: Determines how strongly the main LoRA should be applied. Sane results between 0 and 1 for base inference. For go_fast we apply a 1.5x multiplier to this value; we've generally seen good performance when scaling the base value by that amount. You may still need to experiment to find the best value for your particular lora.

parameters.description: Determines how strongly the main LoRA should be applied. Sane results between 0 and 1 for base inference. For go_fast we apply a 1.5x multiplier to this value; we've generally seen good performance when scaling the base value by that amount. You may still need to experiment to find the best value for your particular lora.

parameters.name: megapixels

param_schema.description: Approximate number of megapixels for generated image

parameters.description: Approximate number of megapixels for generated image

parameters.name: num_outputs

param_schema.title: Num Outputs
param_schema.description: Number of outputs to generate

parameters.description: Number of outputs to generate

parameters.name: aspect_ratio

param_schema.description: Aspect ratio for the generated image. If custom is selected, uses height and width below & will run in bf16 mode

parameters.description: Aspect ratio for the generated image. If custom is selected, uses height and width below & will run in bf16 mode

parameters.name: output_format

param_schema.description: Format of the output images

parameters.description: Format of the output images

parameters.name: guidance_scale

param_schema.title: Guidance Scale
param_schema.description: Guidance scale for the diffusion process. Lower values can give more realistic images. Good values to try are 2, 2.5, 3 and 3.5

parameters.description: Guidance scale for the diffusion process. Lower values can give more realistic images. Good values to try are 2, 2.5, 3 and 3.5

parameters.name: output_quality

param_schema.title: Output Quality
param_schema.description: Quality when saving the output images, from 0 to 100. 100 is best quality, 0 is lowest quality. Not relevant for .png outputs

parameters.description: Quality when saving the output images, from 0 to 100. 100 is best quality, 0 is lowest quality. Not relevant for .png outputs

parameters.name: prompt_strength

param_schema.title: Prompt Strength
param_schema.description: Prompt strength when using img2img. 1.0 corresponds to full destruction of information in image

parameters.description: Prompt strength when using img2img. 1.0 corresponds to full destruction of information in image

parameters.name: extra_lora_scale

param_schema.title: Extra Lora Scale
param_schema.description: Determines how strongly the extra LoRA should be applied. Sane results between 0 and 1 for base inference. For go_fast we apply a 1.5x multiplier to this value; we've generally seen good performance when scaling the base value by that amount. You may still need to experiment to find the best value for your particular lora.

parameters.description: Determines how strongly the extra LoRA should be applied. Sane results between 0 and 1 for base inference. For go_fast we apply a 1.5x multiplier to this value; we've generally seen good performance when scaling the base value by that amount. You may still need to experiment to find the best value for your particular lora.

parameters.name: replicate_weights

param_schema.title: Replicate Weights
param_schema.description: Load LoRA weights. Supports Replicate models in the format <owner>/<username> or <owner>/<username>/<version>, HuggingFace URLs in the format huggingface.co/<owner>/<model-name>, CivitAI URLs in the format civitai.com/models/<id>[/<model-name>], or arbitrary .safetensors URLs from the Internet. For example, 'fofr/flux-pixar-cars'

parameters.description: Load LoRA weights. Supports Replicate models in the format <owner>/<username> or <owner>/<username>/<version>, HuggingFace URLs in the format huggingface.co/<owner>/<model-name>, CivitAI URLs in the format civitai.com/models/<id>[/<model-name>], or arbitrary .safetensors URLs from the Internet. For example, 'fofr/flux-pixar-cars'

parameters.name: num_inference_steps

param_schema.title: Num Inference Steps
param_schema.description: Number of denoising steps. More steps can give more detailed images, but take longer.

parameters.description: Number of denoising steps. More steps can give more detailed images, but take longer.

parameters.name: disable_safety_checker

param_schema.title: Disable Safety Checker
param_schema.description: Disable safety checker for generated images.

parameters.description: Disable safety checker for generated images.
